thread.section_title: LiftMode Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LiftMode | liftmode.com
thread.title: Arley

author: Arley
title: Arley
text: Fast shipping, very responsive customer service -- I had a problem with the shipping company when they told me they may have lost my package due to an address error. LiftMode customer service said they would send a replacement ASAP if the issue with UPS wasn't resolved by the end of the day. Thankfully it was resolved, but it's good to know that LiftMode was so ready to help if anything happened. Thanks!
